name: HoloCook
description:
HoloCook is a short memory game featuring the girls of Hololive EN. Familiarity with Hololive and its characters is not required to play and complete the game.

Whip up strange orders of sandwiches by typing quickly and memorizing menu items. Features 12 stages and unlockable costumes for Mumei if you meet each stage's high-score.
Estimated game time is about thirty minutes to an hour and thirty minutes.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- CONTROLS
Enter/Space - Confirm
Esc/Insert - Cancel, Cutscene Toggle (in Main Menu)
Arrow Keys - Move
Q,W,E,R - Food Row 1
A,S,D,F - Food Row 2
Z,X,C,V - Food Row 3

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- CREDITS
